name: The 00's Are Retro Now?
description:
While listening to the NPR All Songs Considered "New Music Friday" podcast released on 1/26 I was astounded to learn that there are humans on this planet who believe the early 00's are now retro.

It boggled my mind and I can actually see it to some degree, but it got my gears going and I made a little Twine game about killing time in the early 00's. This game is styled to look like it was a really poorly made Geocities fan-site for something, hence the DBZ gif, MIDI of "Dragon Soul" and awful colors + fonts. Not to mention the marquee. I used an actual "" tag for that one even.

I credit the sources of images and audio used on the Credits page, so check those out for where I found the images and sound.
